${modID}:BitingPreview.NAME: Biting
${modID}:BitingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Damage -20%. NL Heal HP equal to cost.

${modID}:DecayingPreview.NAME: Decaying
${modID}:DecayingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Take 2 damage if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:DisgracefulPreview.NAME: Disgraceful
${modID}:DisgracefulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Frail if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:HesitantPreview.NAME: Hesitant
${modID}:HesitantPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:LiquidizingPreview.NAME: Liquidizing
${modID}:LiquidizingPreview.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a random potion if Fatal. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RegretfulPreview.NAME: Regretful
${modID}:RegretfulPreview.DESCRIPTION: Lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand if in your hand at the end of your turn.

${modID}:UnawakenedPreview.NAME: Unawakened
${modID}:UnawakenedPreview.DESCRIPTION: Becomes Awakened when transformed or removed.

${modID}:Amplify.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Power card is played twice.

${modID}:BattleHymn.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! *Smite into your hand.
${modID}:BattleHymn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, add !M! *Smite into your hand.

${modID}:Buffer.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! time you would lose HP.

${modID}:Burst.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Skill is played twice.

${modID}:Creative AI.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Power card into your hand.

${modID}:Double Tap.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Attack is played twice.

${modID}:Dual Wield.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Power card. Add !M! copy of that card into your hand.
${modID}:Dual Wield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack or Power card. Add !M! copies of that card into your hand.

${modID}:Loop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb !M! time.

${modID}:Magnetism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Colorless card into your hand.

${modID}:Mayhem.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play the top !M! card of your draw pile.

${modID}:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand and Retain it. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.
${modID}:Meditate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand and Retain them. NL Enter Calm. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Omniscience.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card !M! times and exhaust it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rip and Tear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power card, Channel !M! Lightning.
${modID}:Storm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel !M! Lightning.

${modID}:Study.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle !M! *Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Tactician.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !M! [G].
${modID}:Tactician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !M! [G].

${modID}:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [B]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
${modID}:Turbo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [B]. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${modID}:Undo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand for !M! turn.
